name: AT SUNDOWN
detailed_description:
Try At Sundown now for free!


Play the demo online or locally, against friends or bots, with up to 4 players in a deathmatch to see who's the best!
The full game experience will include more weapons, more maps, and more fun - Add it to your Wishlist Now!


About the Game

At Sundown is a top down shooter where the maps are covered in darkness and light is your enemy, as 4 players compete in a deathmatch to be the best! Strategic gameplay is vital in the shadows of this dark world in which you only become visible when you shoot, dash or slash. See or be seen, kill or be killed. How long will you survive At Sundown?

Features


  • UNIQUE STEALTH DRIVEN ARENA COMBAT – Unique stealth driven arena combat with dynamic twists and turns where the maps are covered in darkness and light is your enemy.
  • ONLINE & LOCAL MULTIPLAYER – Compete with up to 4 friends in online deathmatch or at home in local deathmatch to see who will dominate!
  • PLAY CHALLENGE MODE OR CO-OP VS. AI – Play co-operatively against AI opponents or take on special challenges to prepare for the live showdown.
  • 6 UNIQUE ZONES WITH MULTIPLE MAPS – Dominate your opponents across multiple maps, each with different light mechanics. Unlock new zones as you level up!

short_description: A top down shooter where the maps are covered in darkness and light is your enemy, as 4 players compete in a deathmatch to be the best!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom II X4 965 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or ATi Radeon R5 and above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX El Capitan 10.11.6
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX Sierra 10.12.1 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 755M and above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04/Linux Mint 18.3
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated HD 4000 and above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04/Linux Mint 18.3 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 and above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or ATi Radeon R5 and above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
